trans-unit.target: 新規ウォレットを作成
既存ウォレットを開く

trans-unit.id: We are about to generate your very own passphrase
trans-unit.source: We're about to generate your very own passphrase
trans-unit.target: 個人パスフレーズをこれから作成します

trans-unit.id: This keeps your account secure, and lets you open your wallet on multiple devices.
trans-unit.source: This keeps your account secure, and lets you open your wallet on multiple devices.
trans-unit.target: このパスフレーズはアカウントを保護して、複数の端末でウォレットを使用できるようにします。

trans-unit.id: It is very important you write this down.
trans-unit.source: It's very important you write this down.
trans-unit.target: このパスフレーズは重要ですので必ず入力してください。
あなたのパスフレーズ (12文字)

trans-unit.id: Your passphrase will not be shown again.
trans-unit.source: Your passphrase will not be shown again.
trans-unit.target: このパスフレーズは今後表示されることはありません。

trans-unit.id: Without it you will lose access to your wallet.
trans-unit.source: Without it you will lose access to your wallet.
trans-unit.target: パスフレーズを紛失するとウォレットにアクセスできなくなるのでご注意下さい。

trans-unit.id: I have written down or otherwise securely stored my passphrase
trans-unit.source: I have written down or otherwise securely stored my passphrase
trans-unit.target: パスフレーズを書き留めるなどして、安全な方法で保管したことを約束します
パスフレーズを確認中
このパスフレーズは無効です

trans-unit.id: Set a PIN for quick access
trans-unit.source: Set a PIN for quick access

trans-unit.target: パスフレーズを再度確認してください

trans-unit.id: Request timeout. Please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.source: Request timeout. Please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.target: 接続がタイムアウトになりました。ネット環境をご確認ください。
詳細は保存できませんでした

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid address to send to
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid address to send to
trans-unit.target: 有効なアドレスをご入力ください
%(max)s未満の金額を入力してください

trans-unit.id: Some funds are temporarily unavailable. To send this transaction, you will need to wait for your pending transactions to be confirmed first.
trans-unit.source: Some funds are temporarily unavailable. To send this transaction, you'll need to wait for your pending transactions to be confirmed first.
trans-unit.target: 残高のうち、未だご利用いただけないBTCがあります。関連取引が確認されるまで少々お待ち下さい。

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: ウォレットの残高をすべて送ろうとしています。手数料を含めると%(sendableBalance)sのみお送りいただけます。送金額の欄に上記の金額を反映しました。

trans-unit.id: You do not have enough funds in your wallet (incl. fee)
trans-unit.source: You don't have enough funds in your wallet (incl. fee)

trans-unit.id: A name is required to set your profile
trans-unit.source: A name is required to set your profile
trans-unit.target: プロフィールを作るには名前の設定が必要です

trans-unit.id: Your browser does not support geolocation
trans-unit.source: Your browser does not support geolocation
trans-unit.target: ブラウザがGPS位置情報に対応していません
位置情報が取得できませんでした

trans-unit.id: Without a name, the payer would not be able to identify you on Mecto.
trans-unit.source: Without a name, the payer wouldn't be able to identify you on Mecto.
trans-unit.target: ハンドルネームを入力しないと、周りのユーザーにあなたのアドレスが見えません。
グラバター用メールアドレス

trans-unit.id: Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is a service that lets you re-use the same avatar across websites and apps by specifying an email address.
trans-unit.source: Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is a service that lets you re-use the same avatar across websites and apps by specifying an email address.
trans-unit.target: グラバターとはメールアドレスの登録で同じアバターがインターネット上どこでも使用できるサービスです。

trans-unit.id: Before you start using Mecto, you need to enter a name that will help others identify you.
trans-unit.source: Before you start using Mecto, you need to enter a name that will help others identify you.
trans-unit.target: 場所をご利用になる前に、他のユーザーと交流できるよう、ハンドルネームを設定する必要があります。

trans-unit.id: You do not have any transactions yet
trans-unit.source: You don't have any transactions yet
trans-unit.target: まだ取引がありません
ウォレットのアドレス
ウォレットのアドレス
近くのユーザーが見つけられませんでした

trans-unit.id: Searching your area for other users
trans-unit.source: Searching your area for other users
trans-unit.target: 他ィブユーザーを検索中

trans-unit.id: Your transaction will appear in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.source: Your transaction will appear in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.target: 取引は間もなく履歴欄に表示されます。

trans-unit.id: Sorry, Coin Wallet did not load.
trans-unit.target: Coinウォレットが読み込めませんでした

trans-unit.id: Try updating your browser, or switching out of private browsing mode. If all else fails, download Chrome for your device.
trans-unit.source: Try updating your browser, or switching out of private browsing mode. If all else fails, download Chrome for your device.
trans-unit.target: ブラウザをアップデートする、もしくはプライベートモードを通常モードに切り替えて下さい。問題が続くようであればChromeブラウザーをオススメしております。
ユーザー名は使用できません。
あなたの指紋をスキャンしてください

trans-unit.id: I Agree To The Terms & Conditions
trans-unit.source: I Agree To The Terms & Conditions
trans-unit.target: 私は利用規約に同意します
入金を受け取りました

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid return address
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid return address
trans-unit.target: 有効な返信先アドレスを入力してください
本当によろしいですか？
アカウントは正常に削除されました

trans-unit.id: This page will be reloaded shortly.
trans-unit.source: This page will be reloaded shortly.
trans-unit.target: このページはまもなくリロードされます。
ペーパーウォレット / 秘密鍵を転送
秘密鍵をエクスポート

trans-unit.id: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
trans-unit.source: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
trans-unit.target: これにより、すべてのコインがペーパーウォレットのアドレスからあなたのウォレットに転送されます。

trans-unit.id: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
trans-unit.source: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
trans-unit.target: あなたの秘密鍵は資金への鍵なので、その鍵に資金へのアクセス権を持たせたいのでない限り、誰かと共有しないでください。

trans-unit.id: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
trans-unit.target: ウォレットにエクスポート用コインの秘密鍵がありません。

trans-unit.id: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending :symbol is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
trans-unit.source: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending %(symbol)s is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
trans-unit.target: ガスリミットはあなたの取引で送るべきガスの量です。この数を増やしても、取引の確認が早くなるわけではありません。 %(symbol)s送信は、21000です。トークン送信は、200000前後です。
コントラクトアドレス

trans-unit.id: Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero
trans-unit.source: Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero
trans-unit.target: 0より大きいガスリミットを入力してください
クリップボードにコピー

trans-unit.id: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
trans-unit.source: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
trans-unit.target: ウォレットアドレス以外のアドレスを入力してください

trans-unit.id: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
trans-unit.source: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
trans-unit.target: ウォレットの秘密鍵以外の秘密鍵を入力してください

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(symbol)s) into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: ウォレットを空にしようとしているようですね。取引手数料と最低積立金 (%(minReserve)s%(symbol)s) を考慮して、あなたが送れる最大金額は%(sendableBalance)sと見積もっています。金額欄の数値を修正しました。

trans-unit.id: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (:minReserve :symbol) to your wallet address.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(symbol)s) to your wallet address.
trans-unit.target: あなたのウォレットは活性化されていません。 有効にするには、最低額（%(minReserve)s %(symbol)s）以上をウォレットのアドレスに送付してください。

trans-unit.id: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than :minReserve :symbol.
trans-unit.source: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(symbol)s.
trans-unit.target: 受信者のウォレットがアクティブになっていません。%(minReserve)s%(symbol)sより大きい金額のみ送信できます。

trans-unit.id: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
trans-unit.source: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
trans-unit.target: 支払いの理由を識別する任意の符号なし32ビット整数あるいは、リップル以外のアカウント。

trans-unit.id: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
trans-unit.source: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
trans-unit.target: 特定の支払の識別に使用できる256ビットのハッシュ。

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid invoice ID
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid invoice ID
trans-unit.target: 有効な請求書IDを入力してください

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid destination tag
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid destination tag
trans-unit.target: 有効な宛先タグを入力してください

trans-unit.id: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
trans-unit.source: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
trans-unit.target: このペアでは現在取引を利用できません
残高%(amount)sXLMのアカウント%(destination)sが作成されました
有効なメモを入力してください

trans-unit.id: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
trans-unit.source: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
trans-unit.target: メモには、オプションで最大28バイトの文字列の追加情報が含まれます。

trans-unit.id: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than :minReserve :symbol.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(symbol)s.
trans-unit.target: ウォレットがアクティベートされていません。%(minReserve)s%(symbol)sより大きい金額のみを受け取ることができます。
プライバシーポリシー

trans-unit.id: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
trans-unit.source: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
trans-unit.target: EOSアカウント名は12文字以内で、1~5の英小文字と数字で構成されます。
アカウント名が無効です

trans-unit.id: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
trans-unit.source: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
trans-unit.target: このアカウント名は既に使用されています。別のアカウントを選択してください。

trans-unit.id: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than :minAmount) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
trans-unit.source: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than %(minAmount)s) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
trans-unit.target: 新しいアカウントを作成するには、取引所または他のEOSウォレットから次のデータを使用してEOS転送（金額が%(minAmount)s以上）を行う必要があります。

trans-unit.id: Account has been successfully set up
trans-unit.source: Account has been successfully set up
trans-unit.target: アカウントは正常に設定されました

trans-unit.id: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
trans-unit.source: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
trans-unit.target: メモには、オプションで最大256バイトの文字列の追加情報が含まれます。

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: ウォレットを空にしようとしているようですね。送れる最大金額は%(sendableBalance)sです。金額欄の数値を修正しました。
宛先アカウントが存在しません。

trans-unit.id: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: 取引は期限切れです。再試行してください。

trans-unit.id: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
trans-unit.source: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
trans-unit.target: アカウントのCPU使用量が超過しました。後でもう一度試すか、他の人にCPUを追加してもらってください。

trans-unit.id: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
trans-unit.source: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
trans-unit.target: アカウントNETの使用量が超過しました。後でもう一度試すか、他の人にNETを追加してもらってください。

trans-unit.id: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
trans-unit.source: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
trans-unit.target: 余分な額は作成したアカウントに入金されます。

trans-unit.id: Can't connect to :network node. Please try again later or choose another token.
trans-unit.source: Can't connect to %(network)s node. Please try again later or choose another token.
trans-unit.target: %(network)s ノードに接続できません。後でもう一度実行するか、別のトークンを選択してください。

trans-unit.id: Network node error. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: %(network)s node error. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: %(network)s ノードエラー。後でやり直してください。
取引が見つかりません

trans-unit.id: Send :depositAmount :depositSymbol to deposit address. It will be converted into :toSymbol, and sent to :toAddress (blokchain: :toBlockchain)
trans-unit.source: Send %(depositAmount)s %(depositSymbol)s to deposit address. It will be converted into %(toSymbol)s, and sent to %(toAddress)s (blockchain: %(toBlockchain)s)
trans-unit.target: %(depositAmount)s%(depositSymbol)sを入金アドレスに送ってください。 は%(toSymbol)sに変換され、 %(toAddress)s (ブロックチェーン: %(toBlockchain)s) に送信されます

trans-unit.id: You have 3 hours to send funds otherwise the transaction will be cancelled automatically.
trans-unit.source: You have 3 hours to send funds otherwise the transaction will be cancelled automatically.
trans-unit.target: 3時間以内に送金しないと、取引は自動的に取り消されます。

trans-unit.id: Property for addresses of currencies that use additional ID for transaction processing (e.g., destination tag, memo or message).
trans-unit.source: Property for addresses of currencies that use additional ID for transaction processing (e.g., destination tag, memo or message).
trans-unit.target: 取引処理に追加 IDを使用する通貨の所在地のプロパティ (アドレス、タグ、メモ、メッセージなど)。

trans-unit.id: Network fee is fixed and taken each time wherever money is sent. Each currency has a strict amount taken for operations. This fee is taken once your funds are included in a blockchain.
trans-unit.source: Network fee is fixed and taken each time wherever money is sent. Each currency has a strict amount taken for operations. This fee is taken once your funds are included in a blockchain.
trans-unit.target: ネットワーク料金は固定されており、送金のたびに課金されます。各通貨には、操作に使用される厳密な金額があります。この料金は、あなたの資金がブロックチェーンに含まれた時に引かれます。

trans-unit.id:
Currently, your transaction (ID: :id) is on hold.
Please, contact Changelly to pass KYC.
trans-unit.source:
Currently, your transaction (ID: %(id)s) is on hold.
Please, contact Changelly to pass KYC.
trans-unit.target:
現在、あなたの取引 (ID:%(id)s) は保留中です。
Changellyに連絡してKYCをパスしてください。

trans-unit.id: Transaction (ID: :id) has failed. Please, contact Changelly.
trans-unit.source: Transaction (ID: %(id)s) has failed. Please, contact Changelly.
trans-unit.target: 取引 (ID:%(id)s) が失敗しました。Changellyに連絡してください。

trans-unit.id: Exchange failed and coins were refunded to :address.
trans-unit.source: Exchange failed and coins were refunded to %(address)s.
trans-unit.target: 交換は失敗し、コインは%(address)sに返金されました。

trans-unit.id: Payment wasn't received since 3 hours since the transaction was created.
trans-unit.source: Payment wasn't received since 3 hours since the transaction was created.
trans-unit.target: 取引が制作されてから3時間経っても支払いが受け取られていません。

trans-unit.id: Amount of coins that is charged from your balance for single transaction (:url).
trans-unit.source: Amount of coins that is charged from your balance for single transaction (%(url)s).
trans-unit.target: 単一取引の残高から請求されるコインの金額 (%(url)s)。

trans-unit.id: Almost done! Enter the following words from your passphrase.
trans-unit.source: Almost done! Enter the following words from your passphrase.
trans-unit.target: もう少しで完成です！パスフレーズから次の単語を入力します。

trans-unit.id: Not all address types are fully compatible on all platforms, so it is important to use a compatible address (:url).
trans-unit.source: Not all address types are fully compatible on all platforms, so it is important to use a compatible address (%(url)s).
trans-unit.target: 全てのアドレスタイプが全部のプラットフォームにおいて完全に互換性があるのではない為、互換性アドレスを使用する事が重要です(%(url)s)。

trans-unit.id: Address will be changed after receiving funds. All previously used addresses remain valid and still can be used to receive funds multiple times. Please use fresh address for each receiving transaction to enhance your privacy.
trans-unit.source: Address will be changed after receiving funds. All previously used addresses remain valid and still can be used to receive funds multiple times. Please use fresh address for each receiving transaction to enhance your privacy.
trans-unit.target: 資金を受領した後、住所を変更して頂くことが可能です。以前に使用された全ての住所登録についても有効のまま残るので、複数回資金を受け取るために使用して頂く事も可能です。プライバシーを保護するためにも、取引を受け取る際は毎回最新の住所を使用するようにしてください。

trans-unit.id: Recipient's wallet requires a destination tag.
trans-unit.source: Recipient's wallet requires a destination tag.
trans-unit.target: 受領者のウォレットには目的地のタグが必要です。

trans-unit.id: Use Touch ID in place of PIN.
trans-unit.source: Use Touch ID in place of PIN.
trans-unit.target: PINの代わりに Touch IDを使用します。

trans-unit.id: Use Fingerprint in place of PIN.
trans-unit.source: Use Fingerprint in place of PIN.
trans-unit.target: PINの代わりに 指紋認証を使用します。

trans-unit.id: Use Biometrics in place of PIN.
trans-unit.source: Use Biometrics in place of PIN.
trans-unit.target: PINの代わりに 生体認証を使用します。
ハードウェアのセキュリティ

trans-unit.id: Always used to open the app.
trans-unit.source: Always used to open the app.
trans-unit.target: アプリをオープンするために必ず使用します。

trans-unit.id: Send coins, export private keys, remove account, security settings.
trans-unit.source: Send coins, export private keys, remove account, security settings.
trans-unit.target: コインを送信、プライベートキーをエクスポート、アカウントを削除、 セキュリティ設定。
ハードウェアキーを追加…

trans-unit.id: Hardware Keys are not supported by your device
trans-unit.source: Hardware Keys are not supported by your device
trans-unit.target: お使いのデバイスはハードウェアキーに対応していません
カスタムトークンを追加

trans-unit.id: This Token has already been added.
trans-unit.source: This Token has already been added.
trans-unit.target: このトークンはすでに追加されています。

trans-unit.id: address is not a valid address.
trans-unit.target: %(address)s は有効なアドレスではありません。
アドレスを記入してください。

trans-unit.id: Your transaction will be replaced in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.source: Your transaction will be replaced in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.target: 取引は間もなく履歴タブに置き換えらます。

trans-unit.id: A new version of Coin Wallet is available. Would you like to update it now?
trans-unit.source: A new version of Coin Wallet is available. Would you like to update it now?
trans-unit.target: Coinウォレットの新規バージョンがあります。今すぐ更新しますか？
取引はすでに追加されています。

trans-unit.id: Not your transaction. It can't be added.
trans-unit.source: Not your transaction. It can't be added.
trans-unit.target: あなたの取引ではないので追加できません。
取引は受諾されました

trans-unit.id: In order to receive funds please switch to Monero coin and accept above transaction on «Receive» tab.
trans-unit.source: In order to receive funds please switch to Monero coin and accept above transaction on «Receive» tab.
trans-unit.target: ファンドを受領するには、Moneroコインに切り替えて、«受領» タブの上にある取引を受諾してください。

trans-unit.id: Transaction fee is too low. Please click on refresh button.
trans-unit.source: Transaction fee is too low. Please click on refresh button.
trans-unit.target: 取引手数料が低すぎます。リフレッシュのボタンをクリックしてください。

trans-unit.id: Only transactions addressed to you can be accepted. The minimum number of confirmations is 10 (:url).
trans-unit.source: Only transactions addressed to you can be accepted. The minimum number of confirmations is 10 (%(url)s).
trans-unit.target: あなたに宛てた取引のみが受諾されます。最小確認番号は10(%(url)s)です。

trans-unit.id: Hardware key is required to complete action.
trans-unit.source: Hardware key is required to complete action.
trans-unit.target: 操作の完了にはハードウェアキーが必要です。
ブロックチェーンをデポジット
ブロックチェーンの宛先
あなたのウォレットアドレスを使用
ガスリミットを増やしてください

trans-unit.id: This private key has no funds for transfer.
trans-unit.source: This private key has no funds for transfer.
trans-unit.target: この秘密鍵には送金用の資金がありません。

trans-unit.id: Not enough funds to pay transaction fee (:required).
trans-unit.source: Not enough funds to pay transaction fee (%(required)s).
trans-unit.target: 取引手数料（%(required)s）を支払うための十分な資金がありません。

trans-unit.id: Oops! something went wrong. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Oops! something went wrong. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: おっと！何か問題が発生しました。後でやり直してください。

trans-unit.id: Derivation path defines how to derive private keys from 12-word passphrase.
trans-unit.source: Derivation path defines how to derive private keys from 12-word passphrase.
trans-unit.target: 派生パスは12語のパスフレーズから秘密鍵を得る方法を定義します。

trans-unit.id: Use Face ID in place of PIN.
trans-unit.source: Use Face ID in place of PIN.
trans-unit.target: PINの代わりに Face IDを使用します。

trans-unit.id: Transaction leaves the destination account with a lower balance than rent-exempt minimum.
trans-unit.source: Transaction leaves the destination account with a lower balance than rent-exempt minimum.
